Package org.yesworkflow.cli

Class YesWorkflowCLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yesworkflow.cli.YesWorkflowCLI

  • public class YesWorkflowCLI
extends Object

    Class that provides the default command-line interface (CLI) for YesWorkflow. The CLI takes one argument (or option) representing the operation to be carried out (currently extract, model, or graph), along with additional options that specify desired outputs and formats. Each operation implies and automatically runs the operations that logically precede it, i.e. the graph command implies the extract and model operations.

    The static main() method instantiates this class and passes the command line arguments it receives from the OS to the runForArgs() method. It then uses the ExitCode returned by runForArgs() as the process exit code.

    The CLI can be invoked programmatically by instantiating this class and calling runForArgs(). This function takes an argument of array of String representing command line arguments and options. The Extractor, Modeler, and Grapher used by the instance may be injected using the extractor(), modeler(), and grapher() methods before calling runForArgs(). A non-default constructor allows the output streams used by YesWorkflow to be assigned.

    • Constructor Detail

      • YesWorkflowCLI

        public YesWorkflowCLI​()
               throws Exception
        Default constructor. Used when YesWorkflow should use the system-provided System.out and System.err streams and an automatically created YesWorkflowDB instance.
        Throws:
        Exception - If errors occur creating the YW database.

      • YesWorkflowCLI

        public YesWorkflowCLI​(YesWorkflowDB ywdb,
                      PrintStream outStream,
                      PrintStream errStream)
        Constructor that injects custom output streams. Used when YesWorkflow should use the streams provided as parameters instead of System.out and System.err.
        Parameters:
        ywdb - The YesWorkflowDB instance to use.
        outStream - The PrintStream to use instead of System.out.
        errStream - The PrintStream to use instead of System.err.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(String[] args)
        Method invoked first when the YesWorkflow CLI is run from the command line. Creates an instance of YesWorkflowCLI, passes the command line arguments to runForArgs(), and uses the integer value associated with the ExitCode returned by runForArgs() as the process exit code.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments provided to the CLI on the command line.

        public void setVersionInfo​(VersionInfo versionInfo)

        Method used to inject the Extractor to be used.
        Parameters:
        extractor - A configured Extractor to use.
        Returns:
        This instance.

        public YesWorkflowCLI modeler​(Modeler modeler)
        Method used to inject the Modeler to be used.
        Parameters:
        modeler - A configured Modeler to use.
        Returns:

        public YesWorkflowCLI grapher​(Grapher grapher)
        Method used to inject the Grapher to be used.
        Parameters:
        grapher - A configured Grapher to use.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • runForArgs

        public ExitCode runForArgs​(String[] args)
                    throws Exception
        Method that parses the provided command line arguments and executes the sequence of YesWorkflow operations requested by them.
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments to parse.
        Returns:
        An ExitCode indicating either that YesWorkflow ran successfully, or that an error of the indicated type occurred.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an exception other than YWToolUsageException or YWMarkupException is thrown while parsing the command line options or executing the YesWorkflow operations.
